channel.title: Making a server
channel.description:
( i have dislectie and i am dutch end i can't good englis but i tray! )
i have download a source (star-scapenew) i have ad monsters enz i can login in the server but nowan els can only me on mij local host when i wana open a poretel must i choes fore com in eth ph mer ppp end out eth ph mer ppp but i doný now what the goed 1 is
ens ther stant Sequentie what must i put in?
end Protocol : Alle TCP UDP ICMP
i hope that some1 can help me!
